tasks.title: Implement Company Profile Management and Advanced Settings
tasks.description: Build a comprehensive company profile management system with logo upload functionality, user roles and permissions, billing management, tax configuration, data export, API access, and system preferences.
tasks.details:
1. Enhance the existing settings module to include company profile management:
   - Create a form for company details (name, address, contact info, etc.)
   - Implement logo upload using Supabase Storage
   - Add validation for company details

2. Develop a user role and permission system:
   - Design a flexible role-based access control (RBAC) schema
   - Create an interface for managing roles and permissions
   - Implement middleware to enforce permissions across the application

3. Build billing and subscription management:
   - Integrate with a payment gateway (e.g., Stripe)
   - Create subscription plans and pricing tiers
   - Implement upgrade/downgrade functionality
   - Add billing history and invoice generation

4. Implement tax configuration and rates management:
   - Create a tax rate management interface
   - Support multiple jurisdictions and tax rules
   - Integrate tax calculations with invoicing and billing

5. Develop backup and data export features:
   - Implement scheduled backups to Supabase Storage
   - Create data export functionality for various entities (clients, invoices, etc.)
   - Support multiple export formats (CSV, JSON, XML)

6. Add API access and webhook configuration:
   - Design and implement a RESTful API for third-party integrations
   - Create an API key management system
   - Implement webhook functionality for real-time event notifications
   - Add an interface for configuring webhooks

7. Create system preferences and customization options:
   - Implement a flexible key-value store for system preferences
   - Create an interface for managing global and user-specific preferences
   - Add theming options and custom branding capabilities

8. Implement audit logs and activity tracking:
   - Design a comprehensive logging system
   - Track user actions, system events, and data changes
   - Create an interface for viewing and filtering audit logs

9. Enhance the existing AuthContext to incorporate the new role-based permissions
10. Update the settings database schema to accommodate new fields and relationships
11. Ensure all new features are responsive and work across different devices
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test company profile updates:
   - Verify all fields can be updated and are properly validated
   - Test logo upload, including file type and size restrictions
   - Ensure company profile changes are reflected throughout the application

2. Validate user role and permission system:
   - Create multiple roles with different permission sets
   - Test access control for various application features
   - Verify that permission changes take effect immediately

3. Test billing and subscription management:
   - Verify successful integration with the payment gateway
   - Test subscription creation, upgrade, and downgrade flows
   - Ensure billing history and invoices are accurately generated

4. Validate tax configuration and calculations:
   - Test tax rate creation for multiple jurisdictions
   - Verify tax calculations in invoices and billing
   - Test tax rate updates and their effect on existing and new transactions

5. Test backup and data export features:
   - Verify scheduled backups are created and stored correctly
   - Test data export for all supported entities and formats
   - Ensure exported data is complete and accurately formatted

6. Validate API access and webhook functionality:
   - Test API endpoints for all CRUD operations
   - Verify API key creation, rotation, and revocation
   - Test webhook configurations and ensure proper event delivery

7. Test system preferences and customization:
   - Verify all customization options can be set and retrieved
   - Test theming changes and custom branding applications
   - Ensure user-specific preferences override global settings where applicable

8. Validate audit logs and activity tracking:
   - Verify all relevant actions are properly logged
   - Test the audit log interface, including filtering and search functionality
   - Ensure sensitive information is properly masked in logs

9. Perform cross-browser and responsive design testing
10. Conduct performance testing, especially for data-intensive operations
11. Perform security testing, including penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
